Name: Port Old-Fashioned
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bourbon and maple syrup somewhat overwhelm the headline port wine, although it does add an underlying fruitiness to this balanced and tasty riff on an Old-Fashioned.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered at Red Star Tavern in Portland, Oregon, USA. Old-Fashioned cocktail history and recipe variations
Nutrition: One serving of Port Old-Fashioned contains 214 calories
